description:
The Nova interface-attach API needs be enhanced to support SR-IOV.

There is a Newton blueprint for this: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/139910/

It has been abandoned, and need to be picked up for ocata/pike.
title: [RFE] SR-IOV - HotPlug support

comments.content:
The Nova interface-attach API needs be enhanced to support SR-IOV.

There is a Newton blueprint for this: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/139910/

It has been abandoned, and need to be picked up for ocata/pike.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~harald-jensas

comments.content: Harald are you volunteering? Or know people who can volunteer?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cdent

comments.content: Automatically discovered version newton in description. If this is incorrect, please update the description to include 'nova version: ...'

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
